fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Jump on somebody's head, dealing a basic attack to them.
- Once per game, throw a net at someone, lowering their attack to None for 2 nights.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you jump on someone with basic attack, you bounce on their head, making you immune to visits that night.
- If you jump on someone with powerful+ defense and at least basic attack, they will make you lose your mushroom. If you have already lost your mushroom, you will die.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Town.
